modName: Eldrids Armor Mashup - 7B Sevenbase Bombshell BBP
summary:
Conversion of the Eldrids Armor Mashup to the 7B-Sevenbase Bombshell Body.
Thanks to anka01 for the permission and Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for the 7B bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img31/848/6bui.png[/img][/center]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] INTRODUCTION [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3]This mod is a conversion of [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652/?] Eldrids Armor Mashup [/url][/b] to the 7B Bombshell Body
If you find any issue post them in the comments section.

[b]The original armor and all its content are still required! Links below.[/b][/size]

sidras01 made a video showing this conversion :D (4:26):
[youtube]n1-8mBv8Qqo#t=4m26s[/youtube]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] REQUIRED [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652/?] Eldrids Armor Mashup [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992//?] SeveNBase FemaleBody Replacer [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][color=crimson]A BBP Skeleton is required or you get a CTD - So choose one [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800//?] XP32[/url][/b] or [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712/?] Skulltyrant's [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse![/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][color=Slategray][size=5pt] CREDITS [/size][/color][/font][/b]
[size=3]Special thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] anka01 [/color][/b] for making the [b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652/?] Eldrids Armor Mashup [/url][/b]
Please also endorse anka01 armors!

Much thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 [/color][/b] for the 7B body
and variations!

[b][color=Lightsteelblue] XP32 [/color][/b] and [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Skulltyrant's [/color][/b] for the BBP and TBBP skeletons and a lot of compatibility between mods.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Nightasy [/color][/b] for making all the tutorials on 3ds MAX.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Shockero [/color][/b] for giving me some finishing tips on converting amors.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] ewi65 [/color][/b] for the [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34966/?] E ENB Final Edition [/url][/b][/size]

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][size=4] My other conversions [/size][/color][/b]
